content: I have just read your article on ‘destroying toxic mindsets…’ — excellent, and thank you. I shall be reading more of your articles. I’d like to point you to a powerful ‘systems aid’ to problem solving and decision making called the ‘One Page Management System’ (OPMS), not widely known today, which enables individuals and groups to identify any ‘Mission’ of interest and to integrate their available good ideas to develop effective Action Planning, along with all needed ‘sub-systems’ to help accomplish the chosen Mission. I can send information about the OPMS as attachments (not large) to an e-mail message. Please let me know if you’d be interested to see it and let me have an email ID to which I may send this material.
